name: Astra Militarum
lore: The Astra Militarum is the sledgehammer of the Emperor, and its countless armies form the vast majority of the Imperiumâ€™s military might. Although often outclassed in terms of strength and technological advancement, the warriors and vehicles of the Imperial Guard stand together, relentlessly wearing down their enemies until nothing is left but a cratered wasteland.

rules.name: Voice of Command
rules.lore: Raised and trained to instil unwavering obedience, officers of the Imperial Guard command authority and respect, and issue orders with imperious bellows that cut through the clamour of war.
rules.text:
At the start the Battle Round, +Officer+ models with this ability can issue an Order to friendly units within 6". The Order is in effect until the end of the Battle Round. Units may only ever be affected by one Order at a time. Orders may not be issued to Battle-Shocked units, and units which become Battle-Shocked lose the benefits of any Orders.

*Move! Move! Move!* - Increase the unit's Movement trait by 3".

*Fix Bayonets!* - The unit has +1 to the Hit roll for all melee attacks.

*Take Aim!* - The unit has +1 to the Hit roll for all ranged attacks.

*Open Fire!* - Increase the Attacks trait of +[Rapid Fire X]+ weapons equipped by the unit by 1.

*Take Cover!* - Improve the Save trait of models in this unit by 1 (limit 3+).

*Duty and Honor!* - Improve the Leadership and Objective Control traits of models in this unit by 1.

upgrades.name: Student of the Codex
upgrades.text: At the start of the battle, gain 1 CP.

upgrades.name: Sworn Fury
upgrades.text: Once during the battle, you may select two enemy units for Oath of Moment instead of one.

strategems.name: Armor of Contempt
strategems.when: Immediately after an enemy unit has declared a Ranged or Melee attack
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, your unit has +1 to its Saving Rolls.
